definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Dobby was a house-elf who served the Malfoy family.
sentences.chinese: 多比是马尔福家族的家养小精灵。

sentences.english: A family dog rescued a newborn boy from the jaws of death.
sentences.chinese: 一只家养犬把一个新生男婴从鬼门关救了回来。

sentences.english: The origin of most of our domestic animals will probably forever remain vague.
sentences.chinese: 大部分家养动物的来源，也许会永远暧昧不明。

sentences.english: We're all going to be Japanese collaborators. Even the dogs you Fangs keep stand by justice and righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 我们全要做汉奸，只有你方家养的狗都深明大义的。

sentences.english: Gray and her team first confirmed that all domesticated dogs trace their heritage back to gray wolves.
sentences.chinese: 戈瑞及她的团队先是确认，所有家养狗都遗传自灰狼。

sentences.english: Of course. I have a dog at home and my girlfriend has a snake.
sentences.chinese: 那还用说？我家养了一只狗。我女朋友养了条蛇。

sentences.english: The Schulzs have more than 30 birds in their home. Many of them are looking for new homes.
sentences.chinese: 舒兹家养了三十多只鸟，当中有许多正在找寻新家。

sentences.english: Dogs run in packs, and domesticated dogs are grieving when separated from their owners for any length of time.
sentences.chinese: 狗喜欢成帮结伙，家养的狗被与主人隔离后就会哀伤。

sentences.english: It would appear that climate has some direct action on the hair of our domestic quadrupeds .
sentences.chinese: 气候对于家养四足兽的毛皮，似乎是有些直接作用的。

sentences.english: The problem now extends to household(4) pets.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题现在扩沿到家养宠物身上。

sentences.english: Some people keep rare animals at home as their pets .
sentences.chinese: 有些人在家养稀有动物当他们的宠物。

sentences.english: Horse is the main tool, wood sinotrans in Sweden nearly home domestic horses.
sentences.chinese: 马是木材外运的主要工具，在当时瑞典几乎家家养马。

sentences.english: It is now illegal to keep chimps as pets in Connecticut.
sentences.chinese: 现在在康涅狄克州把黑猩猩当作家养宠物是违法的。

sentences.english: Local agricultural authorities also found evidence of H5 infection in household birds.
sentences.chinese: 地方农业部门也发现了家养禽鸟中H5感染的证据。

sentences.english: Blu is a domesticated macaw from the jungles of South America.
sentences.chinese: 蓝光是从南美洲丛林家养的金刚鹦鹉。

sentences.english: Somepeople assume that it's good to keep pets in the house, especially for the olds.
sentences.chinese: 有的人认为在家养宠物是好的，特别是老人来说。

definition: to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
native dog/mole cricket (colloquial word for agricultural pest Gryllotalpa 螻蛄|蝼蛄[lou2 gu1])
Tibetan mastiff/also called 西藏獒犬
(of animals) to give birth/to foal, to whelp etc
golden retriever (dog breed)/Cibotium barometz, Asian tropical tree fern with hairy fronds (used in TCM)
